completed.title: Fix the messages rendering strangely
completed.description: Fix the messages rendering outside of the 10 second period, sometimes fading and loading the same message.
criteria: Ensure that the fade in and out only occurs once every 10 seconds consistently.
Ensure that the next loaded item is the next message and not the current message.
Note: The issue occurs when switching to a new tab. The timer will "reset", causing the message to fade in and out 10 seconds as well at the new interval.
